answers.answer: Easier for me she felt so tinny compare to my son and delivery super fast!!!!!!! I never got sick with any of them oh bit with my second I was always so drained and with my son in pain to move as he was so heavy on my body

I was super sick my first pregnancy this time no sickness but the last few days I'm extremely tired n feel crappy :/ I'm eight weeks todayI've a lil bump on my pelvis too... but nothing anyone would notice unless I was in a swimsuit or tight dressat how many weeks did u start showing?
Showing alot sooner, and just alot more tired and painful. Its hard having to chase a toddler and be pregnant.

I am showing so eArly also I got a terrible infection in my intestines I have hemerroids and a terrible rash this pregnancy has been so much worse than my first the first one was a breeze I am only 15 weeks but it is full of surprises

My first pregnancy was great even with preeclampsia but this one is kicking my butt!!! I have severe hip and pelvic pain (I think its SPD) and have been so much more irritable and tired!! I'm pretty sure my son is trying to escape but never felt like this with my daughter

question: What has been different in the second pregnancy vs the first. I would say I'm cramping a little and im showing early .
title: 2nd pregnancy
